Note to all members=

When uploading files please upload small files and make sure you are 
us=
ing MP3 format and not larger file compression such as WAV. This 
group has=
 limited space and all files are subject to deletion to make 
room. For tho=
se who would like to post larger files or multiple files 
you can make use =
of esnips.com for file sharing. Once uploaded you can 
simply post the link=
 to your files just as it does when you upload 
here. Esnips is free and th=
ey give you 50 gb of space and allow 
multiple file formats as well as larg=
er files. The yahoo group only 
allows 100 mb for the ENTIRE group to share=
